title: All About History Annual - Volume 2, 2016 (gnv64)
description:
All About History Annual - Volume 2, 2016
English | Pages 164 | PDF | 96.7 mb

CONTENTS
EMPIRES & CIVILISATIONS
10 Cleopatra's ruthless rise to power
How the iconic pharaoh schemed and seduced her way into history
18 How to build an empire
Discover the secret to expanding your lands the old-fashioned way
20 7 Lost civilisations
Inside the forgotten superpowers that shaped the modern world
27 Anatomy of an Inca warrior
Meet a disciplined and fierce soldier of the fearsome Inca empire
28 Viking raiders
How Vikings ruled the waves with their lucrative trade network
36 What if... The Aztecs hadn't been conquered?
How would the world be different if this empire had lasted, and would they still be around today?
40 The rise of the Ottoman empire
Uncover the methods that forged a 700-year empire that spanned three continents

POLITICS & POWER
50 Anne Boleyn
The romantic beginning and disastrous end of Henry VIII's controversial queen
58 Washington: The first president
Washington's perilous journey to become the father of the USA
66 What if... Lincoln hadn't been assassinated? 
Would impeachment have awaited the president?
70 Stalin: Russia's ultimate tyrant
How the famed dictator dyed the Soviet Union red
78 Malcolm X
Fiercely tackling racial and religious conventions amid the Civil Rights movement
82 Mandela becomes president
Read an eyewitness account of Mandela's momentous f^A inauguration in Pretoria, South Africa

VICTORY & DEFEAT
88 10 Greatest military leaders
Meet ten of the world's most impressive military leaders
97 Anatomy of a Zulu warrior
How the mighty people decimated enemies to expand their territory
98 The Assyrian Army
Inside the cruel fighting machine of the ancient world
100 Waterloo: The fall of Napoleon
200 years on, the final gamble of a man who was willing to risk everything
108 Enigma: A Britain's 1 codebreakers tj
How Britain's triumphant ^^ codebreakers turned the tide in World War Two
116 What if... The USA had won the Vietnam War?
Would Ha Long Bay be a theme park, and would US culture have taken grip?
120 Fall of the Berlin Wall
An eyewitness account of Germany's most historic and emotional moment of the late 20th century

FAME & FORTUNE
126 10 superstars you never knew existed
Forgotten celebrities who paved the way for the stars of today
133 Anatomy of a Greek sculptor
Discover how Greek celebrities were portrayed before television or film
134 Houdini's final trick
How history's greatest illusionist swapped his love of trickery for a hatred of supernatural fraud
142 Inside a 1950s television studio
Beaming the news to the nation during television's formative vears	. â€” *
144 My way: Frank Sinatra's dark side
Delve into the rumours of mafia connections that dogged the crooner's entire career
150 Day in the life of a 1950s movie star
What life was really like on set for stars like Lauren Bacall and Audrey Hepburn
152 Becoming Marilyn
Before she was the blonde bombshell, Norma Jeane was a troubled child
